content: I am not aware of future trends or emerging styles. however, in recent years, some trends in typography have been noticeable. some examples include using bold and bright colors for typography to create a more impactful and eye-catching design, experimenting with variable fonts that allow designers to adjust the width, weight, and style of a font dynamically, and combining different types of typography, such as mixing serif and sans-serif fonts in the same design. also, there has been a trend towards creating more personalized experiences for users by using more custom and unique typography that feels more human and connected. these trends show the evolving nature of typography, and designers using these trends and their creativity can come up with unique, modern, and visually appealing designs that fit the brand's personality and message.
